reference_summary:
MRTREUP 5Pcs Hair Brushes for Women, Hair Comb for Women and Detangling Paddle Brush with Mist Spray Bottle for Wet or Dry Hair, Rail Tail Comb Set for Straight Long Thick Curly Natural Hair
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Color': '5 Pack Muti-purpose Hair Brush Set', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheenDetangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheen   See more', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.92 x 2.56 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MRTREUP'}
Nice set of brushes and combs. And the spray bottle is nice but to my surprise as I squeezed the trigger it already had some sort of liquid in it. I'm not sure if that's from the company testing it or what. But to me that is strange when you receive a new product. However, the spray bottle does work well.
Spray bottle already had liquid in it.
YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party)
YouClean

{'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)  See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'}
These were so fun to wash hands with. The first few went down the sink. My kid had to learn to wet the opposite hand you held the soap in. It suds up really well and smells great! Taking these to the beach for the showers. Love!
So fun to use!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has expanded their focus to include eyelash extension kits alongside their ongoing interest in hair care tools and accessories. They continue to value multifunctional, ergonomic items that enhance beauty routines, emphasizing quality in both hair and lash products.
- **Experience Sensitivity:** They prefer clean, functional products and remain sensitive to packaging changes, particularly eco-friendly options. Their appreciation for sturdy designs is evident, as they emphasize usability in both hair and eye care tools.
- **Rating Behavior:** The user tends to leave positive reviews highlighting quality and functionality. Their latest product review reflects their tendency to praise effective solutions that enhance personal care, confirming a balanced approach that acknowledges minor issues while emphasizing overall satisfaction.
- **Functional Needs:** They seek features that improve comfort during use, promote a polished appearance, and cater to a variety of hair and lash types. Their recent purchase underscores a desire for products that facilitate ease and efficiency in achieving desired looks at home.
- **Purchase Context:** the user actively acquires items that enhance personal grooming routines, reinforcing their commitment to health, hygiene, and overall aesthetics.
- **Consumer Attitude:** They maintain a discerning yet optimistic approach to product evaluation, balancing fun with efficacy in their beauty and self-care practices.

Overall, the user's profile reflects a strong inclination towards high-quality, functional beauty products, coupled with a concern for sustainability and performance in both hair and lash care.
